description:
This is an action learning module on venture capital and technology venture funding. It adopts a systems engineering approach in building technology company from inception, to acceleration and wealth creation. It covers the essentials of technology-focused venture capital from investment evaluation, to due diligence and realisation of investment return. 

The module will equip the students with fund raising know-how through experiential learning activities and networking with venture capitalists. Project teams will be guided through the development of a strategy for fund raising, ways of engaging investors, responding effectively to due-diligence, drafting and negotiating term sheets and closing the financing round.
title: Venture Capital Funding for TechVenture
